revision.comment: Remove template per [[Wikipedia:Templates for discussion/Log/2015 March 16|TFD outcome]]
revision.text: {{talkheader}} {{ArticleHistory |action1=WAR |action1date=17:52, 23 January 2009 (UTC) |action1link=Wikipedia:WikiProject Military history/Assessment/Tom Derrick |action1result=passed |action1oldid=265424178 |action2=GAN |action2date=16:06, 26 January 2009 (UTC) |action2link=Talk:Tom Derrick/GA1 |action2result=listed |action2oldid=266509711 |action3=FAC |action3date=01:08, 4 March 2009 |action3link=Wikipedia:Featured article candidates/Tom Derrick |action3result=promoted |action3oldid=274806035 | topic = War and military | currentstatus = FA |maindate=March 20, 2012 }} {{WikiProjectBannerShell|1= {{WP Australia|class=FA|importance=Mid|military=y|military-importance=Mid}} {{WikiProject Biography|living=n|class=FA|listas=Derrick, Thomas Currie|military-work-group=y|military-priority=Low}} {{WPMILHIST|class=FA|Biography=y|ANZSP=y|WWII=y|A-Class=pass}} }} {{Wikiproject VC migration}} {{Archive box|[[Talk:Tom Derrick/Archive 1|Archive 1]]}} == Article protected == I've just protected the article for three days to stop the edit war which is currently underway. I'd strongly suggest that you attempt to resolve this issue - either here or elsewhere - through discussion rather than reverting one another. [[User:Nick-D|Nick-D]] ([[User talk:Nick-D|talk]]) 11:37, 8 August 2010 (UTC) :I will just say that I had no intention of reverting further at this stage. However, I will stick by what I have previously stated in edit summaries: this matter has [[Talk:Tom Derrick/Archive 1#Let`s sort things out here|previously been discussed]] and the independant admin, Ian and myself all agreed that a reliable, published reference be supplied to support the claim made. This has not been done. [[User:Abraham, B.S.|Abraham, B.S.]] ([[User talk:Abraham, B.S.|talk]]) 11:44, 8 August 2010 (UTC) [[File:Tom Derrick medals.jpg|thumb|alt=A group of eight military medals.|right|225px|Derrick's medals on display at the Australian War Memorial.Left-to-right, Derrick's medals are: [[Victoria Cross]]; [[Distinguished Conduct Medal]]; [[1939–1945 Star]]; [[Africa Star]]; [[Pacific Star]]; [[Defence Medal]]; [[War Medal 1939–1945]]; [[Australia Service Medal 1939–45]]. References: {{LondonGazette |issue=36436 |date=23 March 1944 |startpage=1361 |supp=yes |accessdate=27 July 2008}}; {{LondonGazette |issue=35908 |date=18 February 1943 |startpage=864 |supp=yes |accessdate=27 July 2008}}; [http://naa12.naa.gov.au/scripts/imagine.asp?B=6407287&I=1&SE=1 Service record], pg 17, National Archives.]] ::Done. [[User:Pdfpdf|Pdfpdf]] ([[User talk:Pdfpdf|talk]]) 12:34, 8 August 2010 (UTC) :::Heh, miracle. After months of requests by multiple editors it's finally done ... Condensed into a single, referenced note. [[User:Abraham, B.S.|Abraham, B.S.]] ([[User talk:Abraham, B.S.|talk]]) 08:18, 11 August 2010 (UTC) ::::As there now seems to be agreement, I've lifted the page protection a bit early. [[User:Nick-D|Nick-D]] ([[User talk:Nick-D|talk]]) 08:36, 11 August 2010 (UTC) :::::Implemented note, refs and tweaked image. [[User:Abraham, B.S.|Abraham, B.S.]] ([[User talk:Abraham, B.S.|talk]]) 08:54, 11 August 2010 (UTC) ---- {{reflist}} == Nickname - Homo? == Hi - sorry but is this legit? Or vandalism? — Preceding [[Wikipedia:Signatures|unsigned]] comment added by [[Special:Contributions/203.167.244.130|203.167.244.130]] ([[User talk:203.167.244.130|talk]]) 19:42, 20 March 2012 (UTC) :Vandalism, already reverted. [[User:Tbhotch|Tbhotch]].[[User talk:Tbhotch|™]] Grammatically incorrect? '''Correct it!''' [[User:Tbhotch/EN|See terms and conditions.]] 19:44, 20 March 2012 (UTC) == El Kantara == The "El Kantara" link goes to the city in Algeria. Isn't it supposed to be Al Qantarah El Sharqiyya in Egypt? I don't know much about this aspect of the war or anything about Tom Derrick, but it would seem to make more geographical sense to me. [[Special:Contributions/68.1.172.2|68.1.172.2]] ([[User talk:68.1.172.2|talk]]) 02:12, 23 March 2012 (UTC) == 1995 Australia Remembers Stamps == I found that Tom Derrick featured on the one of the 1995 Australia Remembers Stamps. I have found using google images searching:'1995 Australia Remembers 45c stamps'. A block of stamps which clearly shows Tom and his name printed on the stamp. Can this block of stamps or a cropped version be added to his wikipedia page? Regards [[User:Nford24|Nford24]] ([[User Talk:Nford24|Want to have a chat?]]) 06:04, 19 May 2012 (UTC)
